data.name: ToolboxTabName
data.value: NetAdvantage 11.2 Silverlight

data.name: XamTileManagerAssetLibrary
data.value: Infragistics

data.name: Resources_Customizer_Property
data.value: Returns the Infragistics.Shared.ResourceCustomizer for this assembly.

data.name: XamTileManager_ItemsSource_Property
data.value: Returns or sets an enumerable used to populate the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTileManager.Items collection

data.name: XamTileManager_Properties
data.value: XamTileManager Properties

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_InterTileAreaSpacing_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the amount of spacing between the maximized tile area and the minimized tile area when in maximized mode.

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_InterTileSpacingXMaximized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the amount of spacing between maximized tiles horizontally.

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_InterTileSpacingXMinimized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the amount of spacing between minimized tiles horizontally.

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_InterTileSpacingYMaximized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the amount of spacing between maximized tiles vertically.

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_InterTileSpacingYMinimized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the amount of spacing between minimized tiles vertically.

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_MaximizedTileLocation_Property
data.value: Gets/sets where the maximized tiles will be arranged

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_MaximizedTileLayoutOrder_Property
data.value: Gets/sets how multiple maximized tiles are laid out relative to one another

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_MaximizedTileConstraints_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the constraints use for sizing a tile when it's Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.State is 'Maximized'

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_MinimizedTileConstraints_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the constraints use for sizing a tile when it's Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.State is 'Minimized'

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_MinimizedTileExpandButtonVisibility_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the default visibility of the expand button in a Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile's header.

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_MinimizedExpandedTileConstraints_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the constraints use for sizing a tile when it's Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.State is 'MinimizedExpanded'

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_MinimizedTileExpansionMode_Property
data.value: Gets/sets how many minimized tiles may be expanded.

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_ShowAllMinimizedTiles_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether all minimized tiles are arranged in view

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_ShowTileAreaSplitter_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether a splitter will be shown between the maximized and minimized tile areas which can be used to control the relative size of the these areas.

data.name: ModeSettingsBase_AllowTileDragging_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether the user is allowed to drag tiles to reposition them.

data.name: ModeSettingsBase_HorizontalTileAreaAlignment_Property
data.value: Determines the horizontal alignment of the complete block of visible tiles within the control.

data.name: ModeSettingsBase_RepositionAnimationProperty_Property
data.value: Identifies the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.ModeSettingsBase.RepositionAnimation dependency property

data.name: ModeSettingsBase_RepositionAnimation_Property
data.value: Determines how a Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile animates from one location to another.

data.name: ModeSettingsBase_ResizeAnimationProperty_Property
data.value: Identifies the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.ModeSettingsBase.ResizeAnimation dependency property

data.name: ModeSettingsBase_ResizeAnimation_Property
data.value: Determines how a Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile animates from one size to another.

data.name: ModeSettingsBase_ShouldAnimate_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether tiles will animate to their new position and size

data.name: ModeSettingsBase_VerticalTileAreaAlignment_Property
data.value: Determines the vertical alignment of the complete block of visible tiles within the control.

data.name: NormalModeSettings_AllowTileSizing_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether the user will be allowed to re-size tiles.

data.name: NormalModeSettings_ExplicitLayoutTileSizeBehavior_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether tile heights are synchronized across columns and whether tile widths are synchronized across rows when Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.NormalModeSettings.TileLayoutOrder is set to 'UseExplicitRowColumnOnTile'

data.name: NormalModeSettings_MaxColumns_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the maximum number of columns to use when arranging tiles in 'Normal' mode..

data.name: NormalModeSettings_MaxRows_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the maximum number of rows to use when arranging tiles in 'Normal' mode..

data.name: NormalModeSettings_MinColumns_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the minimum number of columns to use when arranging tiles in 'Normal' mode..

data.name: NormalModeSettings_MinRows_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the minimum number of rows to use when arranging tiles in 'Normal' mode..

data.name: NormalModeSettings_ShowAllTiles_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether all tiles are arranged in view

data.name: NormalModeSettings_TileConstraints_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the constraints use for sizing a tile when it's Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.State is 'Normal'

data.name: NormalModeSettings_TileLayoutOrder_Property
data.value: Gets/sets how the panel will layout the tiles.

data.name: TileConstraints_HorizontalAlignment_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the horizontal alignment of the tile within its allocated slot.

data.name: TileConstraints_Margin_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the margin used around a tile

data.name: TileConstraints_MaxHeight_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the maximum height of a tile.

data.name: TileConstraints_MaxWidth_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the maximum width of a tile.

data.name: TileConstraints_MinHeight_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the minimum height of a tile.

data.name: TileConstraints_MinWidth_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the minimum width of a tile.

data.name: TileConstraints_PreferredHeight_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the preferred height of a tile.

data.name: TileConstraints_PreferredWidth_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the preferred width of a tile.

data.name: TileConstraints_VerticalAlignment_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the vertical alignment of the tile within its allocated slot.

data.name: XamTileManager_HeaderPath_Property
data.value: Gets/sets a path to a value on the source object that will be used to initialize the Header of each Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.

data.name: XamTileManager_InterTileAreaSpacingResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the resolved value that will be used for spacing between the maximized tile area and the minimized tile area when is maximized mode.

data.name: XamTileManager_InterTileSpacingX_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the amount of spacing between tiles horizontally.

data.name: XamTileManager_InterTileSpacingXMaximizedResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the resolved value that will be used for spacing between the maximized tiles horizontally.

data.name: XamTileManager_InterTileSpacingXMinimizedResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the resolved value that will be used for spacing between the minimized tiles horizontally.

data.name: XamTileManager_InterTileSpacingY_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the amount of spacing between tiles vertically.

data.name: XamTileManager_InterTileSpacingYMaximizedResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the resolved value that will be used for spacing between the maximized tiles vertically.

data.name: XamTileManager_InterTileSpacingYMinimizedResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the resolved value that will be used for spacing between the minimized tiles vertically.

data.name: XamTileManager_IsAnimationInProgress_Property
data.value: Returns true if tile animations are in progress (read-only)

data.name: XamTileManager_IsInMaximizedMode_Property
data.value: Returns true if there is at least one Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile whose Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.State is 'Maximized'. (read-only)

data.name: XamTileManager_ItemHeaderTemplate_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the HeaderTemplate that will be set on an item's Tile.

data.name: XamTileManager_ItemTemplateMaximized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the ItemTemplate that will be used when a Tile's State is 'Maximized'.

data.name: XamTileManager_ItemTemplateMinimized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the ItemTemplate that will be used when a Tile's State is 'Minimized'.

data.name: XamTileManager_ItemTemplateMinimizedExpanded_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the ItemTemplate that will be used when a Tile's State is 'MinimizedExpanded'.

data.name: XamTileManager_MaximizedModeSettings_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the settings that are used to layout Tiles when in maximized mode

data.name: XamTileManager_MaximizedItems_Property
data.value: Returns a read-only collection of the items that are maximized.

data.name: XamTileManager_MaximizedTileLimit_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the limit on the number of 'Maximized' tiles that will be allowed.

data.name: XamTileManager_NormalModeSettings_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the settings that are used to layout Tiles when not in maximized mode

data.name: XamTileManager_SerializationIdPath_Property
data.value: Gets/sets a path to a value on the source object that will be used to initialize the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTileManager.SerializationIdProperty of each Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.

data.name: XamTileManager_TileAreaPadding_Property
data.value: Get/sets that amount of space between the XamTileManager and the area where the tiles are arranged.

data.name: XamTileManager_TileCloseAction_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether Tiles can be closed by the user.

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_HorizontalTileAreaAlignment_Property
data.value: Determines the horizontal alignment of the complete block of visible tiles within the control.

data.name: MaximizedModeSettings_VerticalTileAreaAlignment_Property
data.value: Determines the vertical alignment of the complete block of visible tiles within the control.

data.name: NormalModeSettings_HorizontalTileAreaAlignment_Property
data.value: Determines the horizontal alignment of the complete block of visible tiles within the control.

data.name: NormalModeSettings_VerticalTileAreaAlignment_Property
data.value: Determines the vertical alignment of the complete block of visible tiles within the control.

data.name: LoadingItemMappingEventArgs_Item_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the item whose information has just been de-serialized.

data.name: LoadingItemMappingEventArgs_SerializationId_Property
data.value: Represents a string that will be serialized to identify the item. (read-only).

data.name: SavingItemMappingEventArgs_Item_Property
data.value: Returns item whose information is about to be serialized. (read-only).

data.name: SavingItemMappingEventArgs_SerializationId_Property
data.value: Represents a string that will be serialized to identify the item.

data.name: CancelableTileEventArgs_Cancel_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether this action should be cancelled.

data.name: CancelableTileEventArgs_Item_Property
data.value: Returns the affected item (read-only).

data.name: CancelableTileEventArgs_Tile_Property
data.value: Returns the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile that is affected (read-only).

data.name: TileEventArgs_Tile_Property
data.value: Returns the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile that is affected (read-only).

data.name: TileEventArgs_Item_Property
data.value: Returns the affected item (read-only).

data.name: TileStateChangingEventArgs_NewState_Property
data.value: The state that the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile is about to be changed to.

data.name: TileStateChangedEventArgs_NewState_Property
data.value: The new state of the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.

data.name: TileStateChangedEventArgs_OldState_Property
data.value: The old state of the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.

data.name: TileSwappingEventArgs_TargetItem_Property
data.value: Returns the associated item of the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.TileSwappingEventArgs.TargetTile (read-only).

data.name: TileSwappingEventArgs_TargetTile_Property
data.value: Returns the target of the swap (read-only).

data.name: TileSwappedEventArgs_TargetItem_Property
data.value: Returns the associated item of the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.TileSwappedEventArgs.TargetTile (read-only).

data.name: TileSwappedEventArgs_TargetTile_Property
data.value: Returns the target of the swap (read-only).

data.name: XamTile_State_Property
data.value: Returns the current state of the tile (read-only)

data.name: XamTile_Properties
data.value: XamTile Properties

data.name: ObservableItemCollection_IsFixedSize_Property
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether collection has a fixed size.

data.name: ObservableItemCollection_IsReadOnly_Property
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.

data.name: ObservableItemCollection_Count_Property
data.value: Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.

data.name: ObservableItemCollection_IsSynchronized_Property
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (i.e. thread safe).

data.name: ObservableItemCollection_SyncRoot_Property
data.value: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.

data.name: XamTileManager_Items_Property
data.value: Returns the collection of items

data.name: XamTile_AllowMaximize_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether this tile can be maximized by the user.

data.name: XamTile_AllowMaximizeResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the resolved value as to whether this tile can be maximized (read-only).

data.name: XamTile_ContentTemplateMaximized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the ContentTemplate that will be used when the Tile's State is 'Maximized'.

data.name: XamTile_ContentTemplateMinimized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the ContentTemplate that will be used when the Tile's State is 'Minimized'.

data.name: XamTile_ContentTemplateMinimizedExpanded_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the ContentTemplate that will be used when the Tile's State is 'MinimizedExpanded'.

data.name: XamTile_ContentTemplateResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the ContentTemplate to use based on the current Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.State of the tile

data.name: XamTile_ContentVisibility_Property
data.value: Gets the visibility of the content (read-only)

data.name: XamTile_CloseAction_Property
data.value: Gets/sets what happens when this tile is closed.

data.name: XamTile_CloseActionResolved_Property
data.value: Returns the resolved value as to what happens when this tile is closed (read-only).

data.name: XamTile_CloseButtonVisibility_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the visibility of the close button in the header area

data.name: XamTile_CloseButtonVisibilityResolved_Property
data.value: Determines the visibility of the close button in the TileHeaderPresenter (read-only)

data.name: XamTile_ExpandButtonVisibility_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the visibility of the expand toggle button in the header area

data.name: XamTile_ExpandButtonVisibilityResolved_Property
data.value: Determines the visibility of the expand button in the TileHeaderPresenter (read-only)

data.name: XamTile_HasImage_Property
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.Image property has been set.

data.name: XamTile_HasHeader_Property
data.value: Returns a boolean indicating if the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.Header property has been set.

data.name: XamTile_Header_Property
data.value: Gets/sets an object that will appear in the header of this tile.

data.name: XamTile_HeaderTemplate_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the template used to display the content of the tile's header.

data.name: XamTile_Image_Property
data.value: The image used in the tile's header/>.

data.name: XamTile_IsExpandedWhenMinimized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether this tile is expanded when it is minimized

data.name: XamTile_MaximizeButtonVisibility_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the visibility of the maximize toggle button in the header area

data.name: XamTile_MaximizeButtonVisibilityResolved_Property
data.value: Determines the visibility of the maximize button in the TileHeaderPresenter (read-only)

data.name: XamTile_SaveInLayout_Property
data.value: Returns or sets a boolean indicating if the tile should be included in a saved layout.

data.name: TileAreaSplitter_IsDragging_Property
data.value: Returns or sets

data.name: TileAreaSplitter_Orientation_Property
data.value: Returns/sets the orientation of the splitter bar.

data.name: TileAreaSplitter_PreviewStyle_Property
data.value: Returns or sets System.Windows.Style for the System.Windows.Controls.Control instance that is used during a drag operation to represent the preview of where the splitter will be positioned.

data.name: TileAreaSplitter_ShowsPreview_Property
data.value: Returns/sets a boolean indicating whether a preview is shown while the splitter is dragged.

data.name: ItemTileInfo_Index_Property
data.value: Returns the index of the item in the Items collection (read-only)

data.name: ItemTileInfo_Item_Property
data.value: Returns the associated item (read-only).

data.name: ItemTileInfo_LogicalIndex_Property
data.value: Returns the logical index of the item (read-only)

data.name: ItemTileInfo_OccupiesScrollPosition_Property
data.value: Returns true if this item occupies a scroll position (read-only)

data.name: ItemTileInfo_ScrollPosition_Property
data.value: Gets the overall scroll position of this item (read-only).

data.name: TileCommandSource_CommandType_Property
data.value: Gets or sets the TileCommand which is to be executed by the command.

data.name: TileHeaderPresenter_Tile_Property
data.value: Gets/sets the associated tile that the header represents.

data.name: TileAreaPanel_IsAnimationInProgress_Property
data.value: Returns true if a reposition to resize animation is in progress (read-only)

data.name: XamTileManager_ItemContainerStyle_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the style to use for Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile containers that are generated for each item.

data.name: XamTileManager_ItemTemplate_Property
data.value: Returns or sets the data template to use for each item in the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTileManager.Items collection.

data.name: XamTile_IsMaximized_Property
data.value: Returns or sets whether this tile's Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile.State is maximized.

data.name: XamTile_IsClosed_Property
data.value: Returns or sets whether this tile is closed.

data.name: ItemTileInfo_IsClosed_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether this item is closed.

data.name: ItemTileInfo_IsExpandedWhenMinimized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether this item is expanded when it is minimized.

data.name: ItemTileInfo_IsExpandedWhenMinimizedResolved_Property
data.value: Gets the whether this item is expanded when it is minimized (read-only).

data.name: ItemTileInfo_IsMaximized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether this item's state is 'Maximized'.

data.name: ItemTileInfo_SizeOverride_Property
data.value: Gets/sets an explicit size to be returned as the item's preferred size.

data.name: TileDragIndicator_Container_Property
data.value: Returns the FrameworkElement containing the item being dragged (read-only).

data.name: XamTileManagerPersistenceInfo_IsExplicitLayout_Property
data.value: Serializes whether an explicit layout is being used

data.name: XamTileManagerPersistenceInfo_Properties
data.value: XamTileManagerPersistenceInfo Properties

data.name: XamTileManagerPersistenceInfo_Items_Property
data.value: Represents the collections of items in the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTileManager

data.name: XamTileManagerPersistenceInfo_MinimizedAreaExtentX_Property
data.value: Serializes the minimized area extent in the X dimension if it was resized explicitly by the user when the maximized area was on the left or right.

data.name: XamTileManagerPersistenceInfo_MinimizedAreaExtentY_Property
data.value: Serializes the minimized area extent in the Y dimension if it was resized explicitly by the user when the maximized area was on the top or bottom.

data.name: XamTileManagerPersistenceInfo_SynchoronizedTileWidth_Property
data.value: Serializes the synchronized width of all tiles after the user resized a tile and Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.NormalModeSettings.AllowTileSizing was set to 'Synchronized'.

data.name: XamTileManagerPersistenceInfo_SynchoronizedTileHeight_Property
data.value: Serializes the synchronized height of all tiles after the user resized a tile and Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.NormalModeSettings.AllowTileSizing was set to 'Synchronized'.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_Column_Property
data.value: Serializes the item's associated Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile column number if this is an explicit layout.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_ColumnSpan_Property
data.value: Serializes the item's associated Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile column span if this is an explicit layout.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_ColumnWeight_Property
data.value: Serializes the item's associated Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile column weight if this is an explicit layout.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_IsClosed_Property
data.value: Serializes whether the item's associated Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile is closed

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_IsExpandedWhenMinimized_Property
data.value: Serializes whether the item's associated Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile is expanded when it is minimized.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_IsMaximized_Property
data.value: Serializes whether the item's associated Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile is maximized

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_LogicalIndex_Property
data.value: Serializes the logical index of the item.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_MaximizedIndex_Property
data.value: Serializes the index of the item in the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTileManager's Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTileManager.MaximizedItems collection.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_PreferredHeightOverride_Property
data.value: Serializes the preferred height override of the item. This could have resulted from a user resize operation if the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.NormalModeSettings.AllowTileSizing was set to 'Individual'.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_PreferredWidthOverride_Property
data.value: Serializes the preferred width override of the item. This could have resulted from a user resize operation if the Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.NormalModeSettings.AllowTileSizing was set to 'Individual'.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_Row_Property
data.value: Serializes the item's associated Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile Row number if this is an explicit layout.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_RowSpan_Property
data.value: Serializes the item's associated Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile Row span if this is an explicit layout.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_RowWeight_Property
data.value: Serializes the item's associated Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.XamTile Row weight if this is an explicit layout.

data.name: TileItemPersistenceInfo_SerializationId_Property
data.value: Serializes a string identifier that is used to match up the item during de-serialization.

data.name: TileItemAutomationPeer_ItemInfo_Property
data.value: Returns the associated Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.ItemTileInfo object (read-only).

data.name: TileSwappingEventArgs_SwapIsExpandedWhenMinimized_Property
data.value: Gets/sets whether the Tile's IsExpandedWhenMinimized setting will be swapped with the TargetTile"s setting.

data.name: XamTileManager_IsTouchSupportEnabled_Property
data.value: Returns or sets whether touch support is enabled for this control
